source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' and table_schema='saleslt' ORDER BY table_name ASC;

items.value: @createArray('select * from saleslt.product where productid>100','select * from saleslt.customer where customerid > 100 and customerid<1000')

sqlReaderQuery.value: @if(equals(item(), 'product'), 'select * from saleslt.product where productid>100', if(equals(item(), 'customer'), 'select * from saleslt.customer where customerid > 100 and customerid<1000', 'not present in array'))

source.sqlReaderQuery: select lastModified from dbo.highWaterMark where TableName = 'Customer'

activities.name: get last modified date from customer table

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as lastModified from saleslt.customer

dependsOn.activity: get last modified date from customer table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('get highwatermark from table').output.firstRow.lastModified}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('get last modified date from customer table').output.firstRow.lastModified}'

update dbo.highWaterMark set lastModified = cast('@{activity('get last modified date from customer table').output.firstRow.lastModified}' as datetime2) where TableName = 'Customer';
Select * from dbo.highWaterMark;

source.sqlReaderQuery: select lastRunTime from dbo.HWMT where table_name = 'Customer'

activities.name: get last modified date from customer table

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as lastModified from saleslt.customer

dependsOn.activity: get last modified date from customer table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('get highwatermark from table').output.firstRow.lastRunTime}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('get last modified date from customer table').output.firstRow.lastModified}'
select 'Customer' as table_name,'@{activity('get last modified date from customer table').output.firstRow.lastModified}' as lastRunTime

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' and table_schema='saleslt' ORDER BY table_name ASC;
